  'CRITICAL': /TODO.*CRITICAL|FIXME.*CRITICAL|HACK.*CRITICAL/gi,
  'HIGH': /TODO.*HIGH|FIXME.*HIGH|TODO.*URGENT|FIXME.*URGENT/gi,
  'MEDIUM': /TODO.*MEDIUM|TODO(?!.*LOW)(?!.*HIGH)(?!.*CRITICAL)/gi,
  'LOW': /TODO.*LOW|HACK(?!.*CRITICAL)/gi,
